title: Bloomberg Markets: Lazar on Connecting Brands, Retailers
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lazar on Connecting Brands, Retailers
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ronen Lazar. Chief Executive Officer InTurn Discussing the business managing of off-price inventory for retailers and brands.
